content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ETCD
      operator: exists
    - name: ELEMENT
      operator: exists
    - any:
        - name: ETCD
          operator: is_not_unique_relationship
          value: ELEMENT
        - name: ELEMENT
          operator: is_not_unique_relationship
          value: ETCD
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.213
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: ETCD and ELEMENT have a one-to-one relationship
Outcome:
  Message: ELEMENT and ETCD do not have a one-to-one relationship.
  Output Variables:
    - ETCD
    - ELEMENT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '213'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Elements with different start and end rules are different
                  Elements and must be represented as unique values in ELEMENT and
                  ETCD.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.2.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TE

json.Description: ETCD and ELEMENT have a one-to-one relationship

Outcome.Message: ELEMENT and ETCD do not have a one-to-one relationship.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Elements with different start and end rules are different Elements and must be represented as unique values in ELEMENT and ETCD.
